title: Arcane Activations Magic Library
description: Arcane Activations features 275+ sounds for all things magical, mysterious and puzzling ✨
longDescription:
With everything from magical sound effects, background ambiences, a range of arcane UI sfx and stone interaction sounds for environmental puzzles, Arcane Activations can help you on your quest to create wondrous worlds beckoning to be explored. Listen to the preview track.

﻿Wield the power to light up arcane glyphs and symbols, set the night sky aglow with beams of light, raise ruins from subterraneous slumber, and reveal deep dark caverns with the glow of crystals set alight with magic.

﻿Great for fantasy adventure and RPGs, dungeon crawlers & rogue-likes, to expansive puzzle games and beyond ✨
technicalDetails:
Weave magic and mystery into your games with:

  • 145 Arcane Magic sounds – bring symbols and glyphs, beams, magical auras and glows to life with audio! Includes a handful of retro Anime inspired SFX!
  • 32 stone movement & interaction sounds for environmental puzzles and more, including 3 looping stone movement sounds for slide/drag interaction.
  • A set of looping environmental ambiences to set the scene, including earthquake rumble.
  • A selection of magical risers, transitions and whooshes to layer in, add movement and tension.
  • BONUS 61 Arcane UI sounds to round out the experience with sounds designed to compliment your in-game soundscapes.
  • Mix and match sounds for a vast array of spells and enchantments.


Number of Audio Waves/Cues: 278/278

Sample/bit rate: 44,100 Hz 16-bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes: Ambiences, a few stone movement sfx, a few magic loops; No: One-shot sfx

Minutes of audio provided: 17+ mins

Supported Platforms: Windows, Mac

Documentation: PDF info

Preview: Listen

Notes: The library is supported by Unreal Editor 4.25 and above.
